overview: These two giants rekindle an old relationship when they meet on a deserted stretch of beach. The film opens as MIKE sleeps beneath a beach umbrella with the camera gliding along his sun oiled, hairless, powerfully muscled physique.  A Jeep appears on the horizon and it doesn't take RICK long to park, strip down and investigate. Two incredible bodybuilders in the ultimate movie of its kind: filmed entirely in Hawaii.
title: Hawaiian Heat
